text: Yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gaccheyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gaccheyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 58. Should any bhikkhunī not go for the exhortation or for the (meeting that defines) affiliation (i.e., the Uposatha), it is to be confessed.
